author: jm
msg: fail early in sa-compile if there are not enough privileges to install the final compiled rules; add --sudo switch to allow use of 'sudo' to escalate privileges for the final writing step

author: rgreig
msg: There were junit exclusions in the POM files that were causing junit to not be found when compiling tests. This may be a maven bug, but a better solution is to exclude stuff in assembly descriptors instead.
